name: MATLAB App Installation Package
summary: An MLAPPINSTALL file is a compressed app installation package that stores an app created by The MathWorks MATLAB, a programming and numeric computing application. It includes everything required to install the app in MATLAB, including the source code, supporting information (including dependencies), and the icon for the app. MATLAB users create MLAPPINSTALL files to share apps with other MATLAB users they have built with the software.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: MLAPPINSTALL file open in The MathWorks MATLAB R2023a
